main event: Observers reported seeing a large flat object in Camarillo, California on 29/07/1968.
interesting points: The object appeared to be brightly illuminated and somewhat larger than a 100 foot airliner., Observation lasted for 9 seconds., The object was described as possibly giving the appearance of 100 feet in diameter but could have been larger., The sighting could not be conclusively identified as a plane, a meteor, or a UFO., Insufficient data was available for a proper evaluation.
